sentences.en: Early administration of antibiotics may obviate the necessity of surgical incision and drainage.

sentences.en: Given that an accessory spleen does not usually require treatment, accurate preoperative diagnosis will obviate surgery.

sentences.en: In jurisdictions not rejecting the privity requirement as to obviate its effect to a great extent.

sentences.en: The new treatment obviates the need for surgery.

sentences.en: This gives us a wonderful opportunity: rather than fixing mitochondrial mutations, we can obviate them.

sentences.cn: 为了避免误解, 尽可能明白地说明.

sentences.cn: 我们必须在明天之前解决这个问题.
